item.description:
From the Brattle Theatre website, www.brattlefilm.org:
Special Engagement!
A Town Called Panic

5:45, Tickets

(2009) dir Stephane Abuier, Vincent Pata [75 min]
Another stop-motion animation wonder from last year, the Belgian feature A TOWN CALLED PANIC is sort of like a Nickelodeon show on acid. With lead characters cast from simple plastic figurines, the film stars a Cowboy and Indian who are roommates (and sort of dysfunctional brothers) – their unlikely third roommate (and father ‘figure’) is, of course, Horse. Explaining the plot is essentially useless as the real joy of this film comes from discovering how these oddball characters interact with each other and their equally strange neighbor – an absurdly belligerent farmer. Extremely fun!

Watch the trailer:http://www.youtube.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside the theatre holding a Meetup sign.
item.name: "A Town Called Panic" @ The Brattle Theatre!
